sentences: Mike Thorne (born 25 January 1948) is an English record producer, arranger, composer, engineer, and musician.
After studying physics at Hertford College, Oxford, in the late 1960s he worked as a tape operator in London with Deep Purple and many others.
Later he worked as a music journalist, A&R man and in the late 1970s he became a record producer.
He also contributed to Michael Tippett's opera New Year, providing electronic elements for the music.
